data.name: RPG Sounds - The Sewers - Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Sewers is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • The Light At The End Of The Tunnel
  • Enter The King Rat's Lair
  • Filthy Drone

Ambient Sounds
  • Drainage Waterfall
  • Running River

SFX
  • Basilisk Attack (4)
  • Basilisk Drops Dead (4)
  • Bat Distant (6)
  • Drip Pipeline (1)
  • Giant Rat Screech (4)
  • Magic Distant Voices (6)
  • Pipeline Running (1)
  • Rat Screech (6)

data.short_description: The Sewers is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
